Package org.neo4j.adversaries

Class ClassGuardedAdversary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.adversaries.StackTraceElementGuardedAdversary
      • org.neo4j.adversaries.ClassGuardedAdversary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adversary
    public class ClassGuardedAdversary
extends StackTraceElementGuardedAdversary
    An adversary that delegates failure injection only when invoked through certain call sites. For every potential failure injection the current stack trace (the elements of it) are analyzed and if there's a match with the specified victims then failure will be delegated to the actual Adversary underneath.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ClassGuardedAdversary

        public ClassGuardedAdversary​(Adversary delegate,

      • ClassGuardedAdversary

        public ClassGuardedAdversary​(Adversary delegate,
                             Predicate<StackWalker.StackFrame> predicate)
        Specifies victims as arbitrary StackTraceElement Predicate.
        Parameters:
        delegate - Adversary to delegate calls to.
        predicate - arbitrary Predicate for StackTraceElement in the executing thread and if any of the elements in the current stack trace matches then failure is injected.
